fabric.worker.remote

Class InProcessRemoteWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • fabric.net.RemoteNode<RemoteWorker>
      • fabric.worker.remote.RemoteWorker
        • fabric.worker.remote.InProcessRemoteWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InProcessRemoteWorker
extends RemoteWorker
    In-process implementation of RemoteWorker. This is so that a store or dissemination node can contact its colocated worker using the same interface as a worker that is genuinely remote.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
